introduction: A dazzling, ‘round the world, ocean adventure.The long-awaited follow-up to "PandaVision" and "SOS Planet" is here. Experience the ups and downs of life on land and sea in this coming of age story starring the cutest sea turtle on the big screen.From the warm waters of the tropics to the icy Antarctic, join Sammy and his friends on an exciting journey through truly immersive environments. Swim through colorful coral reefs and enjoy a dazzling ride on a fun-loving octopus. Dive into icy polar waters to meet a friendly whale.Are you ready to face the dangers you may encounter with humans?
